content: shabby chic hat this cozy hat works up fast in sparkly moonlight mohair add the frayed denim flower for a cute shabby chic look or leave it off for simply chic one either way this hat equals almost instant gratification skill level easy finished size one size fits most adult materials gauge lion brand moonlight mohair with size g hook and mohair yarn bulky chunky weight yarn 2 inch square = 4 row worked in 1 75 oz /82 yd/50 g per ball pattern and 6 puffs across 3 balls # 510-205 glacier bay 3 yard strip of scrap denim puff material about 1/2 inch wide note draw up loops about ½ in yo insert hook in st yo and size g/6/4 5mm crochet hook draw up a loop * yo draw up a or size needed to obtain gauge loop in same st repeat from * once having 7 loops on hook yo and draw size l/13/8mm crochet hook through last 6 loops on hook yo and draw through remaining 2 loops on tapestry needle hook 1 puff made hat with size g hook foundation ring make a ring of yarn around 2 fingers and hold yarn tail with thumb insert hook into ring and draw up a loop ch1 row 1 6 single_crochet in foundation ring pull loose end of yarn to tighten ring around sts just made join with slip_stitch in top of first single_crochet row 2 chain 3 work puff in same single_crochet chain 1 *work puff in next single_crochet ch1 repeat from *5 times more slip_stitch on top of 1st puff to join 7 puffs and 7 spaces row 3 ch3 work puff in same st as chain 3 ch1 work puff ch1 in each st and ch1 space around join with slip_stitch in top of first puff 14 puffs and 14 spaces row 4 work same as row 3 28 puffs and 28 spaces row 5 ch3 work puff in next ch1 space ch1 work puff ch1 in each ch1 space around 28 puffs and 28 spaces row 6-16 work same as row 5 cut yarn tie off and weave in loose end frayed denim flower note denim is best when cut in one continuous ½ wide strip with no joins follow dotted cutting line on diagram a to ensure the longest fabric strip possible -------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------- a with size l hook foundation ring leaving 6-7 tail of unworked yarn chain 6 join with slip_stitch to 1st chain to form ring row 1 chain 5 single_crochet in ring 5 times tie off tightly leaving a 6-7 tail of yarn wash flower in delicates bag on normal wash cycle and dry in dryer on medium heat attach flower in desired spot on hat using tapestry needle and scrap piece of hat yarn
